verses.verse: Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all his <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H6908>together;<s%> and there were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H5483>him,<s%> and horses and <S%H7393>chariots:<s%> and he went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and fought against <S%H3898>it.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says Ben <S%H1130>Hadad,<s%>
<S%H3701><s%> 'Your silver and your <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H802>mine.<s%> Your wives also and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> even the <S%H2896>best,<s%> are mine.'"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>"It<s%> is according to your <S%H559>saying,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king.<s%> I am yours, and all that I have."

The <S%H4397>messengers<s%> came <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'I <S%H7971>sent<s%> indeed to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, "You shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> me your <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and your <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children;<s%>

but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> to you <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time,<s%> and they shall <S%H2664>search<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that whatever is <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> it in their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and take it <S%H3947>away.<s%>"'"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3045>"Please<s%> <S%H7200>notice<s%> how this man <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H7451>mischief;<s%> for he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to me for my <S%H802>wives,<s%> and for my <S%H1121>children,<s%> and for my <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for my <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and I <S%H4513>didn't<s%> deny him."
All the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> "Don't listen, neither <S%H14>consent.<s%>"

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of Ben <S%H1130>Hadad,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7971><s%> 'All that you sent for to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> I will <S%H6213>do;<s%> but this <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%>'" The <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H1697>message.<s%>

Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "The <S%H430>gods<s%> do <S%H6213>so<s%> to <S%H3254>me,<s%> and more also, if the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H5606>suffice<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who follow <S%H7272>me.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H1696>"Tell<s%> <S%H2296>him,<s%> 'Don't let him who puts on his armor <S%H1984>brag<s%> like he who takes it <S%H6605>off.<s%>'"

It <S%H8085>happened,<s%> when Ben Hadad heard this <S%H1697>message,<s%> as he was <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> he and the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7760>"Prepare<s%> to <S%H7760>attack!<s%>" They prepared to attack the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H259>Behold,<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> near to <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'Have you seen all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude?<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will deliver it into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H3117>day;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"

<S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "By <S%H559>whom?<s%>" He said, "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5288><s%> 'By the young men of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces.<s%>'" Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who shall <S%H631>begin<s%> the <S%H4421>battle?<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> "You."

Then he <S%H6485>mustered<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> and they were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two.<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H6485>them,<s%> he mustered all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> being <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

They went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H6672>noon.<s%> But Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> was <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H5521>pavilions,<s%> he and the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> who helped <S%H5826>him.<s%>

The young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7223>first;<s%> and Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> sent <S%H7971>out,<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H582>"Men<s%> are coming <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "If they have come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive;<s%> or if they have come <S%H3318>out<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H8610>take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive.<s%>"

So these went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> the young <S%H5288>men<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> and the <S%H2428>army<s%> which followed <S%H310>them.<s%>

They <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> his <S%H376>man.<s%> The <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H1130>them.<s%> Ben Hadad the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> on a <S%H5483>horse<s%> with <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> near to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go, <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> <S%H3045>yourself,<s%> and mark, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what you <S%H6213>do;<s%> for at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> will come up against <S%H5927>you.<s%>"

The <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>him,<s%> "Their god is a <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills;<s%> therefore they were <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than <S%H199>we.<s%> But let us <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them in the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and <S%H3808>surely<s%> we shall be stronger than <S%H2388>they.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing:<s%> <S%H5493>take<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H376>away,<s%> every man out of his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> captains in their <S%H6346>place.<s%>

<S%H4487>Muster<s%> an <S%H2428>army,<s%> like the <S%H2428>army<s%> that you have <S%H5307>lost,<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> for <S%H5483>horse,<s%> and <S%H7393>chariot<s%> for <S%H7393>chariot.<s%> We will <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> them in the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and surely we will be <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than <S%H8085>them.<s%>" He listened to their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and did <S%H6213>so.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H8666>return<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> that Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H6485>mustered<s%> the <S%H758>Syrians,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> to <S%H4421>fight<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6485>mustered,<s%> and were <S%H3557>provisioned,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H1121>them.<s%> The children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> before them like <S%H8147>two<s%> little <S%H2835>flocks<s%> of young <S%H5795>goats;<s%> but the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> near and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H758><s%> 'Because the Syrians have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> but he is not a <S%H430>god<s%> of the <S%H6010>valleys;<s%>" therefore I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"

They <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H428>one<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H428>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> So it <S%H7637>was,<s%> that in the seventh <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H7126>joined;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But the <S%H3498>rest<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> into the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who were <S%H3498>left.<s%> Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> into an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%>

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> "See now, we have heard that the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%> Please let us <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on our <S%H4975>bodies,<s%> and <S%H2256>ropes<s%> on our <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and go <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Maybe he will <S%H2421>save<s%> your <S%H5315>life.<s%>"

So they <S%H2296>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on their <S%H4975>bodies<s%> and <S%H2256>ropes<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> Ben <S%H1130>Hadad<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H2421><s%> 'Please let me live.'" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is he still <S%H2416>alive?<s%> He is my <S%H251>brother.<s%>"

Now the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5172>observed<s%> <S%H4116>diligently,<s%> and hurried to <S%H2480>take<s%> this <S%H559>phrase;<s%> and they said, "Your <S%H251>brother<s%> Ben <S%H1130>Hadad.<s%>" Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"Go,<s%> <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H1130>him.<s%>" Then Ben Hadad came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H5927>him;<s%> and he caused him to come up into the <S%H4818>chariot.<s%>

Ben Hadad <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5892>him,<s%> "The cities which my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> from your <S%H1>father<s%> I will <S%H7725>restore.<s%> You shall <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H2351>streets<s%> for yourself in <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> as my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>" <S%H7971>"I,<s%>" said Ahab, "will let you go with this <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>" So he <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7971>him,<s%> and let him go.

A <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Please <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H376>me!<s%>" The man <S%H3985>refused<s%> to strike <S%H5221>him.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> "Because you have not obeyed the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1980>behold,<s%> as soon as you are departed from <S%H738>me,<s%> a lion shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> <S%H3212>you.<s%>" As soon as he was departed from <S%H681>him,<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> and killed him.

Then he <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H376>me.<s%>" The man <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>him,<s%> smiting and wounding <S%H6481>him.<s%>

So the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H5975>waited<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H2664>disguised<s%> himself with his <S%H666>headband<s%> over his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

As the <S%H4428>king<s%> passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> he <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man turned <S%H5493>aside,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> and said, <S%H8104><s%> 'Guard this <S%H376>man!<s%> If by any <S%H6485>means<s%> he be <S%H6485>missing,<s%> then your <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be for his <S%H5315>life,<s%> or else you shall <S%H8254>pay<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>'

As your <S%H5650>servant<s%> was <S%H6213>busy<s%> here and <S%H369>there,<s%> he was gone." The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4941>him,<s%> "So your judgment shall <S%H2782>be;<s%> you yourself have decided it."

He <S%H4116>hurried,<s%> and took the <S%H666>headband<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from his <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5234>recognized<s%> that he was of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7971><s%> 'Because you have let go out of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> whom I had devoted to <S%H2764>destruction,<s%> therefore your <S%H5315>life<s%> shall go for his <S%H5315>life,<s%> and your <S%H5971>people<s%> for his <S%H5971>people.<s%>'"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5620>sullen<s%> and <S%H2198>angry,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>
